ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Good for the early game armor and use to make tranquil boots or ring of basilius later
ItemTooltips.branches: Use branches to make magic wand later
ItemTooltips.gem:
Get to see invsible enemies and to deward.
(Useful against Nyx, Riki, and Bouty Hunter)
ItemTooltips.magic_stick: Really useful item to gain the extra mana to cast a spell when out of mana or to survive one more attack.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Really useful item to gain the extra mana to cast a spell when out of mana or to survive one more attack.
ItemTooltips.ghost: Prevents physical damage. Get if enemies carries can easily kill you.
ItemTooltips.flask: Use to heal when really low or to heal teammates when they are low.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Constantly buy wards throughout the game to give vision for your teammates and to see where the enemies are.
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry:
Starting Item: Buy sentries if someone already bought courier.

Use to deward enemy wards and may be used to block enemy neutral camps.

Note: In low bracket games, enemy usually don't buy wards so sentries may not be needed.
ItemTooltips.tango:
Basic regen for laning phase.

Note: Use tango to cut down tree to double pull for Radiant Side.
ItemTooltips.courier: Essential item in every game; buy it if no one else buys it
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Always have in inventory to help teammates, stop pushes and escape.
ItemTooltips.mekansm:
Remember to use to heal teammates in team fights

Don't get if someone on team is already getting it!
ItemTooltips.flying_courier: Upgrade Courier so help teammates get items to them faster.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Turn off when laning and turn on when pushing.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Get if there are a lot of spell casters and if no one else is getting one.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows:
Get if you are ganking alot and want the extra heal or extra dps.

Remember to use on allies when they are low.
ItemTooltips.force_staff:
Useful for positioning (catching up to fleeing enemies and to avoid damage)

Note: Use on allies to save them espeically when they are disabled
Good against: Furion, Clockwerk, Disruptor
ItemTooltips.necronomicon:
Use to push lanes faster and to detect invisible heroes.

Note: Last Will from melee summon does a lot of damage (Good if enemies have a lot of AoE)
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Makes 3 familiars; Good for pushing lanes and gives extra stun
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo:
Good for pushing lanes and increases mobility for the team.

Note: On use it gives movement and ATTACK SPEED
Can refresh charges by buying recipe again.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage:
Gives good mana regen and helps physical attackers do more damage.

Since Visage can kite easily with Grave Chill, the negative effect won't hurt as much.

Use when you are ganking where you won't take alot of physical damage.
ItemTooltips.smoke_of_deceit: Use to pick off enemies or surprise attack enemies
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Long range slow! Abuse the range and cooldown of the item.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots:
Gives good movement speed and heals for a good amount of HP.

Note: If no enemies around, you can drop health gaining items on the ground to increase the output of the heal

AbilityTooltips.visage_grave_chill:
One of the most powerful slow in the game.
Early Game: Abuse spell to harass enemies with auto attacks since enemies have low attack speed and movespeed.
Mid Game: Good slow to chase down enemies and to gank.
Note: Useable on creeps and neutrals to catch fleeing out of range enemies or to run away.
AbilityTooltips.visage_soul_assumption:
Great Offensive Nuke
Does huge amount of damage when max charges.
Use ASAP when max charges so more charges can be gain and because it has a short cooldown.
AbilityTooltips.visage_gravekeepers_cloak:
Great Defensive Spell for Mid Game
Helps keep Visage alive during team fights.
AbilityTooltips.visage_summon_familiars:
Good for pushing and good disable when stuns are chained together.
Use to melt towers/barracks, scout enemies/runes, stun and dps.
Note: Look at the description section for more information.
